name: Yaqeen Institute for Islamic Research
mission: Books Yaqeen Books provides high-quality, well-researched Islamic books and ebooks focused on providing practical solutions to contemporary problems.
theoryOfChange: Yaqeen Institute for Islamic Research has a published document titled 'Faithful Activism: A Sunnah Framework'. This document is described as instructional notes formulated for a course, aiming to provide a systematic treatment and a guiding framework for Muslims to engage in healthy civic participation in various social spaces. It outlines 'part platform and part procedural approach—the what and the how—to achieve this aim,' focusing on 'Preservation of faith' and 'Participation with faith' to inspire active involvement in building a better society based on scriptural imperative.
zakatClaimEvidence: Dedicated zakat page found at https://yaqeeninstitute.org/zakat (Source: https://yaqeeninstitute.org/zakat)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Good donor alignment with manageable risk. Evidence quality is solid but still evolving in places.

components.evidence: Explicit zakat program (+4); Muslim-focused organization (+2); Islamic identity (+1); Humanitarian service (+2)
components.improvement_suggestion: Clarify zakat allocation policy and eligible use categories for donors.

alignment.rationale: Alignment 28/50: MEDIUM Muslim donor fit, advocacy cause area

all_citations.claim: The charity holds a 96.0/100 score for financial health and accountability.
The organization is Zakat-eligible and maintains a specific zakat policy.
Total revenue for the period was $8,759,241.
The institute provides high-quality Islamic books and ebooks focused on contemporary problems.
The organization tracks impact through annual Ramadan series views and student curriculum usage.
The organization offers multiple donation options and giving methods for supporters.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization earns a solid overall rating due to its exceptional financial efficiency and high data confidence, though its focus on advocacy and capacity building results in a more moderate impact score compared to direct-service charities.
areas_for_improvement: The organization's impact is primarily focused on capacity building and advocacy, which may be less direct than immediate humanitarian aid.
While the institute has a strong track record, its alignment score suggests a medium fit for donors seeking high-urgency crisis intervention.

dimension_explanations.alignment: The institute is Zakat-eligible and serves as a specialized resource for Muslim donors seeking intellectual and educational advocacy [2][9]. While it maintains a high track record in its niche, the alignment score reflects a medium donor fit as the cause is categorized under advocacy rather than urgent humanitarian relief [1].
dimension_explanations.impact: Yaqeen demonstrates effectiveness through significant digital reach, including high viewership for its Ramadan series and widespread curriculum adoption by students [4][8]. With a program expense ratio of 86.1% and a Charity Navigator score of 96.0/100, the institute shows a strong commitment to its mission-driven activities [1][3].

baseline_narrative.headline: Yaqeen Research Institute Inc addresses contemporary challenges through high-quality Islamic research and educational resources.
strengths: High program expense ratio of 86.1%, ensuring the vast majority of funds support research and content production.
Exceptional fundraising efficiency of $0.00 per $1 raised, indicating highly effective resource acquisition.
Strong liquidity with 12.0 months of working capital available to sustain operations.
baseline_narrative.summary: Yaqeen Research Institute Inc is a research-focused organization that produces books, ebooks, and multimedia content to provide practical solutions to modern problems [4]. The institute maintains a high level of transparency and financial health, evidenced by its Zakat-eligible status and strong third-party ratings [1][2].

rich_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization earns a solid overall rating due to its exceptional financial efficiency and high data confidence, though its focus on advocacy and capacity building results in a more moderate impact score compared to direct-service charities.

areas_for_improvement.context: While digital reach is high, the organization could <cite id="13">publish beneficiary counts consistently</cite> to allow for more precise cost-effectiveness assessments.
To strengthen its evidence base, the institute should <cite id="14">seek external evaluation</cite> of its educational outcomes beyond internal tracking.

bbb_assessment.summary: Meets 10 of 20 BBB standards; improvements needed in formal board oversight and effectiveness policies.

case_against.mitigation_notes: The organization maintains high financial transparency and a clear theory of change to mitigate these governance gaps.
risk_factors: <cite id="15">Does not currently meet all 20 BBB standards</cite>, specifically regarding board oversight policies.
case_against.summary: The primary limitation is the nature of the work; as a research institute, its <cite id="18">impact is indirect</cite> compared to charities providing immediate physical aid.

confidence.notes: Strong financial and digital reach data available.

alignment.explanation: The organization is a strong fit for donors prioritizing intellectual dawah, with <cite id="16">verified zakat eligibility</cite> and a focus on Islamic orthodoxy.
alignment.improvement: Clarify <cite id="17">zakat allocation policy</cite> and specific eligible use categories to provide more detail for zakat donors.

credibility.explanation: Donors can trust this charity due to its <cite id="9">96/100 rating from Charity Navigator</cite>, a <cite id="11">100/100 leadership score</cite>, and its Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid.
credibility.improvement: To strengthen credibility further, the charity could address <cite id="15">BBB standards regarding board oversight and compensation policies</cite>.

impact.explanation: Operations are highly efficient with a <cite id="4">86.1% program expense ratio</cite> and <cite id="10">12.0 months of operating reserves</cite>.
impact.improvement: Impact measurement would benefit from <cite id="13">tracking cost-per-beneficiary</cite> and commissioning independent evaluations.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who value intellectual dawah and want to fund the production of high-quality Islamic research that addresses modern doubts and strengthens faith globally.
donor_motivations: Want to support long-term intellectual infrastructure for the Muslim community
Value high-production multimedia content for youth and students
Prefer organizations with extremely low overhead and high financial efficiency
Seek to fulfill zakat through educational and research initiatives
giving_considerations: Impact is measured in views and curriculum adoption rather than lives saved
The organization is well-funded with significant reserves
Focus is on capacity building and advocacy rather than direct humanitarian relief
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors seeking to provide immediate emergency relief (food, water, medicine) to crisis zones.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: Grade C reflects strong internal tracking of digital metrics and curriculum usage, but a lack of independent, third-party impact evaluations.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: Yaqeen aims to <cite id="19">inspire a world of faithful changemakers</cite> by providing research that dismantles doubts and nurtures conviction.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Evidence ensures that research content is actually reaching and influencing the target audience effectively.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: While revenue is growing, the scale of global digital dawah needs allows for significant absorption of new capital.

peer_comparison.differentiator: Distinguished by its <cite id="5">zero-dollar fundraising cost</cite> and massive <cite id="7">20.5 million digital view count</cite>.

strengths.detail: The organization maintains a <cite id="4">86.1% program expense ratio</cite> and spends <cite id="5">$0.00 to raise every $1</cite>, maximizing donor impact.
Yaqeen holds an <cite id="9">overall score of 96.0/100 from Charity Navigator</cite> and has earned a Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid.
The institute successfully scales its impact through digital media, achieving <cite id="7">over 20 million views</cite> for its flagship series.

strengths_deep_dive: Yaqeen Research Institute distinguishes itself through a robust governance structure and financial resilience. With <cite id="10">12.0 months of working capital</cite>, the organization is well-positioned to sustain its research initiatives during economic fluctuations. Its leadership is highly rated, receiving a <cite id="11">perfect 100 score for Leadership from Charity Navigator</cite>. Furthermore, the institute's commitment to transparency is reflected in its <cite id="12">independent board of 13 members</cite>, which provides strong oversight for its global operations.
rich_narrative.summary: Yaqeen Research Institute Inc operates as a premier intellectual hub dedicated to addressing contemporary challenges through <cite id="1">high-quality Islamic research and educational resources</cite>. The organization focuses on dismantling doubts and nurturing conviction by producing a diverse array of content, including <cite id="2">research papers, videos, podcasts, and infographics</cite>. Financially, the institute demonstrates exceptional health, reporting <cite id="3">$8,759,241 in total revenue</cite> for the 2023 tax year. A hallmark of its operational efficiency is its <cite id="4">86.1% program expense ratio</cite> as reported in its latest filings, alongside a <cite id="5">fundraising efficiency of $0.00 per $1 raised</cite>. This lean financial model ensures that nearly every dollar donated directly supports its mission of <cite id="6">reviving the essence of orthodoxy</cite> through intellectual empowerment. The institute's reach is significant, with its 2025 reporting highlighting <cite id="7">20,500,000 digital views for its Ramadan series</cite> and <cite id="8">37,075 students utilizing its curriculum</cite>.
